availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Johnson Henderson. Father of Mary C. Henderson, John T. Henderson, Robert Henderson, and Kate Henderson. Laborer in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Frankfort in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 45B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 268.
"Mrs. Kate H. Rodgers," Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 11359.
"John Henderson (1807-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial 134853620, accessed January 19, 2024, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/134853620.
